articles.author: Steve Benen
articles.title: Deceptive video targeting Biden is a sign of things to come
articles.description: When many news consumers to trust nonsense, rather than journalism, it's a problem.
articles.content: At an event in New Hampshire earlier this week, Joe Biden spoke at some length about the importance of changing the culture around violence against women. Soon after, some of the former vice president’s detractors took 19 seconds of his comments, removed ever… [+3078 chars]

articles.author: MPX
articles.title: Suleimani killing a 'body blow for the Iranian regime'
articles.description: The New Yorker's Dexter Filkins, who wrote extensively about Qassim Suleimani in 2013, discusses the significance of his killing.

articles.author: Steve Benen
articles.title: Emails point to 'clear direction' from Trump in Ukraine scheme
articles.description: New reporting points to Donald Trump's direct role in freezing the congressionally approved military aid.
articles.content: A couple of weeks ago, the Center for Public Integrity obtained 146 pages of heavily redacted emails from the Trump administration through a Freedom of Information Act request and court order, and the revelations helped move the ball forward on better underst… [+3598 chars]

articles.author: Steve Benen
articles.title: With airstrike, Trump gambles on dangerous new Iran posture
articles.description: In a crisis, many Americans want to be able to rely on their president's competence and judgment. Donald Trump hasn't exactly made that easy.
articles.content:
Tensions between the United States and Iran were already rising. Donald Trump yesterday decided to take the situation in a dangerous new direction by targeting and killing Qassim Suleimani, a commander of Iran’s military forces in the Middle East.
The United… [+3258 chars]

articles.author: MSNBC.com
articles.title: Most Americans believe Trump committed impeachable offense
articles.description: New polling from FiveThirtyEight and Ipsos shows that most Americans believe the president committed an impeachable offense and should be removed from office. The panel discusses.

articles.author: MPX
articles.title: Trump predicted Obama would attack Iran to 'get elected'
articles.description: In a 2011 video, Donald Trump predicted a 'weak and ineffective' President Obama would attack Iran in order to win a second term. Trump followed this notion up at other points in 2011 and 2012.

articles.author: MPX
articles.title: Parallels between now and 1998 Iraq air strike
articles.description: In December 1998, the New York Times ran a cover story on the delay of the impeachment vote on Bill Clinton due to Clinton's launch of an 'Iraq air strike.'
